Test.DescriptiveName: The Ancestor element MUST NOT have @ID
NodeInfo/@Route can only be in NodeInfo Root
NodeInfo/@TargetRoute can only be in NodeInfo Root
If JDF/@Type=GrayBox, then Category MUST be present (T. 1 MIS ICS
MUST be specified when Type='Combined'
JDF Root MUST have CustomerInfo linked as Input element. (T.6 of MIS ICS)
JDF Root MUST have NodeInfo linked as Input element. (T.6 of MIS ICS)
Comment/@Name='JobDescription' ONLY in the Root Node or AncestorPool. This tests for the AncestorPool
Comment/@Name='JobDescription' ONLY in the Root Node or AncestorPool. This tests for the Root Node
Comment/@Name='Description' ONLY in the SubNodes
Comment/@Name='Instruction' ONLY applies to JDF/@TYpe='ProcessGroup||Combined||GrayBox'
This is suppposed to test to make sure JDF/Employee is present
This will test to see when Component is not FinalProduct, ProductType MUST be present
JMF/@ResponseURL is a W! in MIS ICS Level 1.
RelatedJobID MUST be present if RelatedJobPartID is present.
If @ComponentType contains 'FinalProduct', @Dimensions MUST be present
JMF/@ICSVersions MUST be in JMF Root Node
JMF/@xmlns MUST occur in Root node
If Query Message is in NodeInfo, JobID MUST be written
HotFolder is a !w in SubmissionMethods (T.72 of JMF ICS)
@ReturnURL is a !w in T.74 of JMF ICS
If Notification/@Type='Milestone', Milestone element MUST be written (T. 32 of MIS ICS)
Only one of the following attributes can be written in QueueEntryPosParams
In T. 68 of JMF ICS, if @JobPartID is written, @JobID MUST also be written.
NodeInfo/@TargetRoute cannot be written for JMF L2 compliace.
NumberUp MUST be written if SignatureCell exists (T.47 of MISPRE ICS)
MUST be specified if @BinderySignatureType=Die; Otherwise, MUST NOT be written (T.47 of MISPRE ICS)
Description for SignatureCell in T.47 of MISPRE ICS
If JDF/@Types=Stripping, one Assembly MUST be present.
If JDF/@Types=Stripping, one StrippingParams MUST be present.
Name can appear in Root Layout element (T. 66 of MISPRE ICS)
AssemblySection MUST be present when @Order='List' (T.45 of MISPRE ICS)

Test.DescriptiveName: The Ancestor element MUST NOT have @ID
NodeInfo/@Route can only be in NodeInfo Root
NodeInfo/@TargetRoute can only be in NodeInfo Root
MUST be specified when Type='Combined'
JDF Root MUST have CustomerInfo linked as Input element. (T.6 of MIS ICS)
JDF Root MUST have NodeInfo linked as Input element. (T.6 of MIS ICS)
Comment/@Name='JobDescription' ONLY in the Root Node or AncestorPool. This tests for the AncestorPool
Comment/@Name='JobDescription' ONLY in the Root Node or AncestorPool. This tests for the Root Node
Comment/@Name='Description' ONLY in the SubNodes
Comment/@Name='Instruction' ONLY applies to JDF/@TYpe='ProcessGroup||Combined||GrayBox'
This is suppposed to test to make sure JDF/Employee is present
This will test to see when Component is not FinalProduct, ProductType MUST be present
If JDF/@Type=GrayBox, then Category MUST be present (T. 1 MIS ICS)
RelatedJobID MUST be present if RelatedJobPartID is present.
If @ComponentType contains 'FinalProduct', @Dimensions MUST be present
AmountPool cannot be written as a child of PartAmount (T.18 of Base ICS)
JMF/@ICSVersions MUST be in JMF Root Node
JMF/@xmlns MUST occur in Root node
If Query Message is in NodeInfo, JobID MUST be written
HotFolder is a !w in SubmissionMethods (T.72 of JMF ICS)
@ReturnURL is a !w in T.74 of JMF ICS
If Notification/@Type='Milestone', Milestone element MUST be written (T. 32 of MIS ICS)
Only one of the following attributes can be written in QueueEntryPosParams
In T. 68 of JMF ICS, if @JobPartID is written, @JobID MUST also be written.
NodeInfo/@TargetRoute cannot be written for JMF L2 compliace.
If JDF/@Types='Approval' then ApprovalSuccess Resource MUST be written
@Types MUST include Imposition ProofImaging (T.12 of MISPRE ICS)
If ApprovalRole='Group' then MinApprovals MUST be 1 or omitted

NodeInfo/@Route can only be in NodeInfo Root
NodeInfo/@TargetRoute can only be in NodeInfo Root
MUST be specified when Type='Combined'
JDF Root MUST have CustomerInfo linked as Input element. (T.6 of MIS ICS)
JDF Root MUST have NodeInfo linked as Input element. (T.6 of MIS ICS)
Comment/@Name='JobDescription' ONLY in the Root Node or AncestorPool. This tests for the AncestorPool
Comment/@Name='JobDescription' ONLY in the Root Node or AncestorPool. This tests for the Root Node
Comment/@Name='Description' ONLY in the SubNodes
Comment/@Name='Instruction' ONLY applies to JDF/@TYpe='ProcessGroup||Combined||GrayBox'
This is suppposed to test to make sure JDF/Employee is present
This will test to see when Component is not FinalProduct, ProductType MUST be present
If JDF/@Type=GrayBox, then Category MUST be present (T. 1 MIS ICS)
RelatedJobID MUST be present if RelatedJobPartID is present.
If @ComponentType contains 'FinalProduct', @Dimensions MUST be present
AmountPool cannot be written as a child of PartAmount (T.18 of Base ICS)
JMF/@ICSVersions MUST be in JMF Root Node
JMF/@xmlns MUST occur in Root node
If Query Message is in NodeInfo, JobID MUST be written
HotFolder is a !w in SubmissionMethods (T.72 of JMF ICS)
@ReturnURL is a !w in T.74 of JMF ICS

@Types MUST include Imposition RIPing and ImageSetting (T.27 of MISPRE ICS)
If ApprovalRole='Group' then MinApprovals MUST be 1 or omitted
If Preview-Thumbnail contains PageNumber, then it cannot contain SignatureName, SheetName, or Side

If JDF/@Type=GrayBox, then Category MUST be present (T. 1 MIS ICS)
RelatedJobID MUST be present if RelatedJobPartID is present.
If @ComponentType contains 'FinalProduct', @Dimensions MUST be present
AmountPool cannot be written as a child of PartAmount (T.18 of Base ICS)
JMF/@ICSVersions MUST be in JMF Root Node
JMF/@xmlns MUST occur in Root node
If Query Message is in NodeInfo, JobID MUST be written
HotFolder is a !w in SubmissionMethods (T.72 of JMF ICS)
@ReturnURL is a !w in T.74 of JMF ICS
If Notification/@Type='Milestone', Milestone element MUST be written (T. 32 of MIS ICS)
Only one of the following attributes can be written in QueueEntryPosParams
In T. 68 of JMF ICS, if @JobPartID is written, @JobID MUST also be written.
NodeInfo/@TargetRoute cannot be written for JMF L2 compliace.
If @Types includes Bending, BendingParams MUST be present (MISPRE T.31)

DeviceCap.Types: Imposition ColorSpaceConversion ProofImaging Approval RIPing PreviewGeneration ImageSetting

NameState.AllowedValueList: Imposition ColorSpaceConversion ProofImaging Approval RIPing PreviewGeneration ImageSetting
NameState.Name: Types

EnumerationState.AllowedValueList: Waiting TestRunInProgress Ready FailedTestRun Setup InProgress Cleanup Spawned Suspended Stopped Completed Aborted Part Pool
EnumerationState.Name: NodeStatus

EnumerationState.AllowedValueList: Consumable Handling Implementation Intent Parameter PlaceHolder Quantity
EnumerationState.Name: Classes

EnumerationState.AllowedValueList: None Brief Modules Details Capability Full
EnumerationState.Name: DeviceDetails

EnumerationState.AllowedValueList: Uknown Idle Down Setup Running Cleanup Stopped
EnumerationState.Name: DeviceStatus

EnumerationState.AllowedValueList: Block Other Ribbon Sheet Proof Web FinalProduct PartialProduct
EnumerationState.Name: ComponentType

NameState.AllowedValueList: BackCover BlankBox Body Book BookBlock BookCase Box Brochure BusinessCard Carton Cover FlatBox FrontCover Insert Jacket Label Pallet Poster Newspaper Unknown
NameState.Name: ProductType

NameState.AllowedValueList: Accounting Administrator Approver ArtReturn Billing Customer Delivery DeliveryCharge Owner Pickup Sender Supplier SurplusReturn
NameState.Name: ContactTypes

Test.DescriptiveName: The Ancestor element MUST NOT have @ID
NodeInfo/@Route can only be in NodeInfo Root
NodeInfo/@TargetRoute can only be in NodeInfo Root
MUST be specified when Type='Combined'
JDF Root MUST have CustomerInfo linked as Input element. (T.6 of MIS ICS)
JDF Root MUST have NodeInfo linked as Input element. (T.6 of MIS ICS)
Comment/@Name='JobDescription' ONLY in the Root Node or AncestorPool. This tests for the AncestorPool
Comment/@Name='JobDescription' ONLY in the Root Node or AncestorPool. This tests for the Root Node
Comment/@Name='Description' ONLY in the SubNodes
Comment/@Name='Instruction' ONLY applies to JDF/@TYpe='ProcessGroup||Combined||GrayBox'
This is suppposed to test to make sure JDF/Employee is present
This will test to see when Component is not FinalProduct, ProductType MUST be present
If JDF/@Type=GrayBox, then Category MUST be present (T. 1 MIS ICS)
RelatedJobID MUST be present if RelatedJobPartID is present.
If @ComponentType contains 'FinalProduct', @Dimensions MUST be present
AmountPool cannot be written as a child of PartAmount (T.18 of Base ICS)
JMF/@ICSVersions MUST be in JMF Root Node
JMF/@xmlns MUST occur in Root node
If Query Message is in NodeInfo, JobID MUST be written
HotFolder is a !w in SubmissionMethods (T.72 of JMF ICS)
@ReturnURL is a !w in T.74 of JMF ICS
If Notification/@Type='Milestone', Milestone element MUST be written (T. 32 of MIS ICS)
Only one of the following attributes can be written in QueueEntryPosParams
In T. 68 of JMF ICS, if @JobPartID is written, @JobID MUST also be written.
NodeInfo/@TargetRoute cannot be written for JMF L2 compliace.
@Types MUST include Imposition RIPing and ImageSetting (T.27 of MISPRE ICS)
If Preview-Thumbnail contains PageNumber, then it cannot contain SignatureName, SheetName, or Side
If ApprovalRole='Group' then MinApprovals MUST be 1 or omitted
PartIDKeys CANNOT contain be partitioned by PageNumber and SigName, SheetName, Side (T. 41 of MISPRE ICS)
